擂.definition: (bound form) platform for a martial art contest; Taiwan pr. [lei2]

擂臺.definition: elevated stage on which martial competitions or duels were held; arena; ring

擂臺賽.definition: single-elimination open tournament (the winner stays on until he is himself defeated)

擂茶.definition: "leicha", a beverage or gruel made from tea leaves, roasted peanuts and herbs etc ground into a powder, traditionally consumed by Hakka people and in the north of Hunan province

擂鼓鳴金.definition: to beat the drum and sound the gong (idiom); fig. to order an advance or retreat; to egg people on or to call them back
